properties.entry: UPDATE TODAY SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE TODAY_NO = ?

SELECT TODAY_NO , TODAY_TITLE , TODAY_NAME , TODAY_TIME , NICKNAME , MEM_COUNT , LEV , TO_CHAR(TODAY_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') AS "TODAY_DATE" FROM TODAY T JOIN MEMBER ON (TODAY_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE TODAY_TYPE = 2 AND T.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY TODAY_NO DESC

SELECT TODAY_NO , TODAY_TITLE , TODAY_CONTENT , NICKNAME , TODAY_NAME , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH:MI') AS "CREATE_DATE" , TODAY_VEHICLE , TODAY_TIME , TODAY_COURSE , MEM_COUNT , LEV , TO_CHAR(TODAY_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') AS "TODAY_DATE" , USER_NO , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE REF_BNO = TODAY_NO AND STATUS = 'Y' ) AS "REPLY_COUNT" FROM TODAY T JOIN MEMBER ON (TODAY_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE TODAY_NO = ? AND T.STATUS = 'Y'

INSERT INTO TODAY ( TODAY_NO , TODAY_TITLE , TODAY_CONTENT , TODAY_NAME , TODAY_DATE , TODAY_TIME , TODAY_COURSE , TODAY_VEHICLE , TODAY_WRITER , LEV , TODAY_TYPE ) VALUES ( 'T' || SEQ_TNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 2 )
